```{r setup}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(error = TRUE, comment = NA, warnings = FALSE, errors = FALSE, messages = FALSE, tidy = FALSE, echo = FALSE)
library(knitr)
eval_chunks <- c('chunk2', 'chunk3')
```


```{r key1, eval=params$key}
print(opts_current$get("label"))
```


```{r chunk2, eval=opts_current$get("label") %in% eval_chunks}
print(opts_current$get("label"))
```


```{r chunk3, eval=opts_current$get("label") %in% eval_chunks}
print(opts_current$get("label"))
```
